name: Miasma (jeffk1m)
description:
Story:

A forest has been corrupted by an evil presence. Generators producing an evil miasma are affecting the land. Mechanical monsters have been left there to guard the generators and ensure the forest's destruction. Out of desperation, the forest guardian calls out to you and brings you forth to save the forest. It is up to you to avoid the monsters, deactivate the generators and save the forest.

Features:

  • Use stealth and wits to avoid the menacing mechanical monsters roaming the forest
  • Explore an enchanting forest that has been corrupted by an evil presence
  • Uncover the mystery of the generators

Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Interact: E
  • Jump: Space
  • Crouch: CTRL
  • Run: Shift
  • Options/Settings Menu: "P"

Link to Trailer:

Setup and Installation:

Download the .zip file and unarchive the unity project. Once your done unarchiving the unity project just click on Miasma.exe and enjoy the game!
